resources.string: Fantastic Beat and where to find them

James "Jimmy" Howlett, also known as Logan or by his codename, The Wolverine, is a fictional character originating as the primary protagonist of 20th Century Fox\'s X-Men film series, and appearing in and the Marvel Cinematic Universe media franchise produced by Marvel Studios
